MCQ: Data science is described as an interdisciplinary field that uses techniques and theories from many areas. Which of these fields is explicitly mentioned as a source of techniques and theories for data science?
Choices: a : Astrology | b : Mathematics | c : Fine Arts | d : Theology

MCQ: In 2015, the American Statistical Association identified three emerging foundational professional communities for data science. Which of the following was one of them?
Choices: a : Fashion Design | b : Database Management | c : Classical Music | d : Sports Journalism

MCQ: What is a primary goal of data science, according to the text?
Choices: a : To create new programming languages | b : To extract or extrapolate knowledge and insights from data | c : To replace all human jobs with robots | d : To only store data without analysis
